doc.title: Intergalactic Who's Who: The Pork 'n' Being
doc.plot: The Intergalactic Who's Who is a series of 1:30 minute animations, absurd sci-fi "documentaries" on various fantastical creatures from the wild desert planet of Zig 5. On the planet Zig 5 a life span can last mere minutes, there are vicious predators everywhere, and no one stops to smell the roses because the flowers have legs and run away. This is a strange place located on the edge of known space. The Intergalactic Wildlife Service sends Naturenauts there to document the world in all it's unruly glory and many are sacrificed in their quest for knowledge and rare video footage.
